description.value:
Fire

Aura 5

Creatures that enter or start their turns in the aura take 20 fire damage. Creatures in the aura have concealment against ranged attacks.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire

Standard

Reach 4

+37 vs AC; 2d12+12 damage, plus 6d6 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+37 vs AC; 2d12+12 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a position where it flanks the red dragon, at-will

The dragon attacks the target with its tail; reach 4; the triggering enemy; +35 vs Reflex; 4d10+12 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

At-Will

Standard

Targets an adjacent creature

+30 vs Reflex; 1d12+10 damage, and a Large or smaller target is grabbed, pulled 1 square into the dragon's space, and restrained. A creature trapped underneath the brood mother's bulk has line of sight and line of effect only to the brood mother, and no creatures have line of sight or line of effect to it. A creature that escapes the grab is no longer underneath the brood mother and no longer restrained; the character shifts to the nearest square that is not part of the brood mother's space. If the brood mother moves so that it no longer occupies the grabbed character's space, then the character is no longer grabbed or restrained. Sustain Minor: The brood mother sustains the grab, and the target takes 20 damage plus 10 fire damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+35 vs or (whichever is lower); 4d12+10 fire damage, and the red dragon makes a secondary attack against the same target.

Secondary Attack: +33 vs Fortitude; the target's fire resistance is negated until the end of the encounter. Miss: Half damage, and no secondary attack.

Encounter ✦ Fire

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Targets enemies

Close burst 10; +35 vs. Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Resist 40 fire 		Init +24 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 48Fort 48Ref 43Will 42
Speed 12, fly 12 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 34 (+27)
Con 30 (+25)		Dex 25 (+22)
Int 18 (+19)		Wis 22 (+21)
Cha 19 (+19)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +24, Insight +26, Intimidate +29Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 31 | Insight 36
